jobDescription:
We're seeking an exceptional Applied AI/ML Engineer to join our founding team. If you want to bring AI to the real-world and deliver immediate value to businesses and customers nationwide, we would love to chat!



Responsibilities:

Architect, build, and maintain real-time conversational AI systems to deliver exceptional accuracy for our automated order taker
Conduct applied research on new customer-facing challenges we encounter
Lead product adoption of the latest in generative AI and machine learning research
Work closely with our customers and analyze data to continuously improve model performance and the customer experience
Implement machine learning best practices, ensuring maintainability of ML systems in production
Contribute to the overall technology stack and participate in other technical projects as needed


Requirements:

Strong Python and production-level software engineering expertise
Deep understanding of LLMs, prompt engineering, and modern NLP
Proficiency with Kotlin or Java
Track record deploying ML systems to real-world applications
Track record of solving complex technical challenges in ambiguous environments
Strong collaboration and communication skills, both with team members and external stakeholders 
Empathy for users and a bias towards taking a customer-centric approach to product development and decision making


Nice-to-haves:

Experience with Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR)
Hands-on experience in real-time or low-latency systems
Working knowledge of TypeScript
Demonstrated ability building with open source LLMs
